events.title: Stoopicold Drift Registration 2022
events.description: SEE YOU NEXT YEAR IN 2023! THANKS TO ALL WHO DRIFTED WITH US IN ’22!~

events.title: M Power Tour Test Drive Event
events.description: On July 31,2018, you’re invited to join us for the M Power Tour, an exclusive event featuring the latest in BMW performance, engineering, and technology. Drive your favourite M cars and SUV’s for the first time, experience the thrill of pure German performance, and help support the MacLaren Art Centre.
